Question: Ambilight Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Philips

Ambilight TV Range 2024

- Range includes OLED+, OLED, Mini-LED, and DLED models
- OLED+959 features Ambilight Plus, 8th Gen P5 AI processor, META Technology 2.0, and Bowers & Wilkins 5.1.2 sound system
- OLED+909 offers 8th Gen P5 AI processor, META 2.0 OLED panel, META Multi Booster algorithm, and Bowers & Wilkins 3.1 sound system
- OLED809 series includes 8th Gen P5 AI processor, OLED_EX panels, and three-sided Ambilight
- PML9009 Mini-LED model with 144Hz 98% DCI WCG panel, 1000 Nits peak light output, and three-sided Ambilight
- PUS8909 'The One' series with P5 processor, 144Hz WCG LCD panel, and three-sided Ambilight
Summary_cn:
飞利浦

2024年Ambilight电视系列

- 系列包括OLED+、OLED、Mini-LED和DLED型号
- OLED+959采用Ambilight Plus，第8代P5 AI处理器，META Technology 2.0以及Bowers & Wilkins 5.1.2声系统
- OLED+909提供第8代P5 AI处理器，META 2.0 OLED面板，META Multi Booster算法以及Bowers & Wilkins 3.1声系统
- OLED809系列包括第8代P5 AI处理器，OLED_EX面板以及三面Ambilight
- PML9009 Mini-LED型号配备144Hz 98% DCI WCG面板，1000尼特峰值亮度输出以及三面Ambilight
- PUS8909 'The One'系列采用P5处理器，144Hz WCG液晶面板以及三面Ambilight
